short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk identify and normalize phone numbers to E.164 format, finding each number's country info quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly discover which country an international phone number belongs to with our powerful country finder tool. This tool is designed to normalize mobile phone numbers into the universally recognized E.164 format, making the identification process more reliable and efficient. All you need are the complete phone numbers, including their respective country codes. 

Ideal for businesses and individuals dealing with an extensive list of international numbers.

Our tool is highly flexible with the input. Users often input phone numbers in various formats:

(516) 888-XXXX or
516888XXXX or
1(516) 888-XXXX or
+1(516) 888-XXXX ... etc.

But don't worry - regardless of the input format, our tool will always normalize it to the desired E.164 format:

+1516888XXXX

# Features
✓ Format Flexibility: Accepts various phone number formats and normalizes them to the E.164 standard, such as +1516888XXXX.
✓ Bulk lookup of phone numbers
✓ Easy import of numbers from a CSV file
✓ Save checked history list
✓ Download the Success/Failure/All list to a CSV file

# What data can be exported?
isValid
Formated Phone Number ( in E.164 format, e.g.: +1516888XXXX)
International format (e.g.: +1 516 888 XXXX)
National format (e.g.: (516) 888-XXXX)
Country Code
Country Iso2 and Iso3
Numeric code
Country Name

# Getting Started is Easy
1. Click 'Add New Check Task' Button
2. Enter Numbers or Upload CSV file that includes numbers
3. Click 'Start to Lookup' Button
